info.name: Wild Battlemage, Fighter subclass by CurlyFries

description.p: Many magical societies employ bladesingers or eldritch knights as their frontline champions, but such societies leak magic into the land and rivers like a contagion, and it is not uncommon for children to be born in such places with minor sorcerous abilities that do not require such dedicated study.

Whether natural born or created through experimentation, a wild battlemage has learned to harness a wellspring of chaotic magic within themselves unleashing it upon the battlefield in a variety of dazzling and confusing effects.

sheet.description: A chaotic wellspring of magic unleashed on the battlefield in a storm of blades and magic.

description.p: You know the chaos bolt spell, which you may cast at 1st level without expending a spell slot; Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell. You can cast the spell in this way a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. You may also cast chaos bolt normally using any spell slots you may possess.
When you gain the Extra Attack feature, you may cast chaos bolt using this trait with a casting time of one attack, instead of one action. You may still only cast one spell per turn as normal.
